泟字的基本解释

泟
chēng
古同“浾”。

泟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chēng］
［《廣韻》側加切，平麻，莊。］
［《集韻》癡貞切，平清，徹。］
亦作“泟1”。
棠枣之汁。《说文·赤部》：“浾，棠棗之汁也。”棠枣之汁色赤，故亦泛指赤色汁液。

泟字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　泟； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页617第05
【唐韻】敕貞切【集韻】癡貞切，?音檉。【玉篇】赤也。一曰棠棗汁也。【說文】本作䞓。或从水作浾，或从正作泟。

泟字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
泟字的起名意思

指棠枣汁。

Luo
Basic explanation of words
Luo
chēng
Ancient Tong "Fun".
Luo
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chēng]
["Guangyun" side cut, plain hemp, Zhuang. ]
["Jiyun" is infatuated, clear and thorough. ]
Also known as "泟1".
Juice of Tang Jujube. "Shuowen·Chibu": "Fun, the juice of Tang jujube." The juice of Tang jujube is red, so it also refers to the red juice in general.
Luo
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Water Word Department】　泟; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 617 05
[Tang Yun] Chi Zhen cut [Ji Yun] Chi Zhen cut,? Sound tame. [Jade articles] Chi also. One said Tang jujube juice. [Said the text] This is a Cheng. Either from the water for the 浾, or from the Zheng for the 泟.
